name: Cosmic Kitty
description:
Our first small game as a studio! ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅ

Welcome to Cosmos Kitty. This game was made with a lot of love, maybe that’s why it is so cute.

Cosmos Kitty is a side-scrolling endless runner with upgrade elements. Our team decided to make a small experience, adding a small story about Sami, an energy seeker. The team hopes you enjoy Cosmos Kitty. And please let us know what you think so we can continue creating games. “ヽ(´▽｀)ノ”

Please note the web version does not save your progress. It's meant for you to give it a quick test run and if you like it, download our other platforms.
